---
title: "Vanessa M. Quintana - Home"
page-layout: custom

listing:
  - id: learn
    contents: learn/*/*.qmd
    type: grid
    fields: [image, title]
    sort: "date desc"
    sort-ui: false
    filter-ui: false
    page-size: 4
    grid-columns: 2

  - id: events
    contents: events/*/index.qmd
    type: grid
    grid-columns: 3
    fields: [image, title]
    sort: "date desc"
    sort-ui: false
    filter-ui: false
    page-size: 3

  - id: resources
    contents: resources/*/index.qmd
    type: grid
    grid-columns: 2
    fields: [image, title, subtitle]
    sort: "date desc"
    sort-ui: false
    filter-ui: false
    page-size: 4

  - id: certifications
    contents: certifications/*/index.qmd
    type: grid
    fields: [image, title]
    sort: "date desc"
    sort-ui: false
    filter-ui: false
    grid-columns: 4
    page-size: 4

toc: false
title-block-banner: false
include-in-header: meta.html
comments: false
---

<div class="hcc-intro">

  <!-- LEFT: Slideshow + Title + Button -->

    <div class="slideshow">
      <img src="images/VMQ/Misc/PXL_20250821_190604919.jpg">
      <img src="images/VMQ/Workshops/IMG_9271.JPG">
      <img src="images/VMQ/Conferences/20251107_155319.jpg">
      <img src="images/VMQ/Conferences/Screenshot_20251115_134541_Photos.jpg">
      <img src="images/VMQ/Field_Work/PXL_20231013_105335902.jpg">
      <img src="images/VMQ/Field_Work/PXL_20231013_110633731.jpg">
    </div>

    <div class="hcc-left-text">
      <h1> Complex Systems Need Simple Models</h1>
      <p class="subtitle">Transparent, Reproducible, and Co-Developed Modeling Tools</p>

      <button class="learn-btn"
              onclick="window.location.href='learn/modeling_basics.qmd'">
        Learn More
      </button>
    </div>

  </div>

  <!-- RIGHT: Quote -->
  <div class="hcc-right">

    <div class="quote-box">
      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 100 125" class="quote-icon">
        <path fill="white" d="M6.438,50.5v35.875h35.875V50.5h-20.5c0-11.321,9.179-20.5,20.5-20.5V14.625C22.498,14.625,6.438,30.686,6.438,50.5z 
        M93.562,30V14.625c-19.814,0-35.875,16.061-35.875,35.875v35.875h35.875V50.5h-20.5C73.062,39.179,82.241,30,93.562,30z"/>
      </svg>

      <p class="quote-text">
        <i>Complex ecological systems don’t need complicated models—
they need transparent ones.
My goal is to co-develop simple, reproducible modeling tools that reflect community priorities, clarify assumptions, and support real decision-making.</i>
      </p>

      <img src="images/vmq.png" class="quote-logo">
    </div>

  </div>

</div>

<!-- FEATURE TILE GRID — FOUR MAIN CATEGORIES -->

<div class="tile-section-bg">

  <div class="wrap">

    <!-- TILE 1 — Hydrodynamics -->
    <div class="tile">
      <img src="images/VMQ/Field_Work/PXL_20230929_104536477.jpg" />
      <a href="models/hydrodynamics/index.qmd">
        <div class="text">
          <h1>Hydrodynamics</h1>
          <p class="animate-text">
            Flow regimes, tidal asymmetry, sediment transport, and estuarine dynamics.
          </p>
          <div class="dots"><span></span><span></span><span></span></div>
        </div>
      </a>
    </div>

    <!-- TILE 2 — Agent-Based Modeling -->
    <div class="tile">
      <img src="images/home_sections/abm.jpg" />
      <a href="models/abm/index.qmd">
        <div class="text">
          <h1>Agent-Based Modeling</h1>
          <p class="animate-text">
            Behavior, migration, schooling, cues, and exposure pathways.
          </p>
          <div class="dots"><span></span><span></span><span></span></div>
        </div>
      </a>
    </div>

    <!-- TILE 3 — Habitat Modeling -->
    <div class="tile">
      <img src="images/home_sections/habmod.jpg" />
      <a href="models/habitat/index.qmd">
        <div class="text">
          <h1>Habitat Modeling</h1>
          <p class="animate-text">
            Life-stage HSI, integrated fitness, and Penobscot River mapping.
          </p>
          <div class="dots"><span></span><span></span><span></span></div>
        </div>
      </a>
    </div>

    <!-- TILE 4 — Co-Development & Outreach -->
    <div class="tile">
      <img src="images/VMQ/Workshops/PXL_20250806_114400592.jpg" />
      <a href="events/outreach/index.qmd">
        <div class="text">
          <h1>Co-Development & Outreach</h1>
          <p class="animate-text">
            Workshops, partnerships, mentoring, and science communication.
          </p>
          <div class="dots"><span></span><span></span><span></span></div>
        </div>
      </a>
    </div>

  </div>

</div>

<div class="container-blue">

  <h1 class="section-title">
    Five Pillars of My Modeling Philosophy
  </h1>

  <div class="layout_grid_objectives">
    <div class="achievements">

      <!-- Transparent Modeling -->
      <div class="work">
        <div class="work-icon">
          <img src="images/glasses.gif" class="pillar-icon">
        </div>
        <p class="work-heading">Transparent Modeling</p>
        <p class="work-text scroll-text">
          I build models that clearly state their assumptions, uncertainty, and limitations, replacing black-box tools with transparent, communicable frameworks grounded in ecological realism.
        </p>
      </div>

      <!-- Reproducible Science -->
      <div class="work">
        <div class="work-icon">
          <img src="images/steps.gif" class="pillar-icon">
        </div>
        <p class="work-heading ">Reproducible Science</p>
        <p class="work-text scroll-text">
          From hydrodynamic preprocessing to agent-based simulations, every workflow is version-controlled, documented, and openly accessible to support reproducibility and scientific trust.
        </p>
      </div>

      <!-- Co-Development -->
      <div class="work">
        <div class="work-icon">
          <img src="images/consultation.gif" class="pillar-icon">
        </div>
        <p class="work-heading">Co-Development</p>
        <p class="work-text scroll-text">
          I collaborate with Tribal partners, federal agencies, fisheries managers, and local communities to ensure model assumptions and outputs reflect lived experience and shared priorities.
        </p>
      </div>

      <!-- Simplicity in Complexity -->
      <div class="work">
        <div class="work-icon">
          <img src="images/magic.gif" class="pillar-icon">
        </div>
        <p class="work-heading ">Simplicity in Complexity</p>
        <p class="work-text scroll-text">
          Complex systems don’t need complicated tools, but models that isolate key mechanisms and stay adaptable and accessible.
        </p>
      </div>

      <!-- Decision Support -->
      <div class="work">
        <div class="work-icon">
          <img src="images/puzzle.gif" class="pillar-icon">
        </div>
        <p class="work-heading ">Decision Support</p>
        <p class="work-text scroll-text">
          I design tools that support decision-making by visualizing risk, mapping habitat, exploring scenarios, and helping communities and agencies respond to environmental challenges.
        </p>
      </div>

    </div>
  </div>

</div>
